issue.title: When is ROS bag recorder ready?

content.raw:
@{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} it was problem back in November. Since that we delayed saving/sending log file:

[https://github.com/robotika/osgar/commit/705da788152ad866259903750613b3cc0a3ed852#diff-86cde26030f8bf507fbbd07d08a3c642](https://github.com/robotika/osgar/commit/705da788152ad866259903750613b3cc0a3ed852#diff-86cde26030f8bf507fbbd07d08a3c642)

so now we wait for 1000 `/clock` messages before we start to “send log to ROS”. It would be nice to have this fully deterministic, but … you can probably close this issue, thanks.
content.html:
@Nate Koenig it was problem back in November. Since that we delayed saving/sending log file:

https://github.com/robotika/osgar/commit/705da788152ad866259903750613b3cc0a3ed852#diff-86cde26030f8bf507fbbd07d08a3c642

so now we wait for 1000 /clock messages before we start to “send log to ROS”. It would be nice to have this fully deterministic, but … you can probably close this issue, thanks.
